{{Wireless embedded system |brand=T-Com |model=Speedport W701V |revision=(HW101) |manuf_country=Germany |is_manuf=No |manuf=AVM |availability=EoL |est_release_date=03/2007 |type=wireless router, dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETD7200;TNETD7200ZDW; |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL064A90TFIR3 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Qimonda |ram1_model=HYB39SC256160FE-7 |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1350A |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996;ADM6996LC; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot=AVM EVA |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_pass=0000 }} {{TagLine|Speedport W 701V}} :[http://hilfe.telekom.de/hsp/cms/content/HSP/de/3388/FAQ/theme-71990825/Geraete-und-Zubehoer/theme-2000178/DSL-Geraete/theme-66139021/Speedport-Serie/theme-66140359/Speedport-W-7xx-Serie/theme-9152828/Speedport-W-701V Downloads] (Telekom)
:Per the manual, the default SSID is on the label. :The device seems to use WPA-PSK (TKIP) by default.
===Links=== *{{fritzbox|W701V}} *[[AVM]] â€¢ {{boxmatrix|w701v}} :Product: [[AVM]] Fritz Box Speedport W701V :ar7_8MB_xilinx_4eth_2ab_isdn_pots_wlan
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:t_com:speedportw701v ''Speedport W701V'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :CPU: [[TI]] TNETD7200ZDW (AR7) @211MHz :8MB Flash, 32MB RAM :There is a ''DataMatrix'' code on the board :([http://online-barcode-reader.inliteresearch.com/ which appears to decode to 000012335426]). <!-- *[http://wiki.gpl-devices.org/index.php/T-Com_Speedport_W701V On the '''GPL-Devices''' wiki] *[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tJhQDIQFBtM YouTube video showing a board shot of the unit] -->
